categorization_criteria.easy: Basic tasks, simple prompts, single-step operations, general knowledge
categorization_criteria.medium: Multi-step processes, some technical knowledge required, moderate complexity
categorization_criteria.hard: Complex implementations, advanced technical skills, multi-part projects, specialized knowledge

evaluation_considerations: Easy benchmarks test basic AI competency and knowledge recall
Medium benchmarks evaluate multi-step reasoning and technical implementation
Hard benchmarks require specialized domain expertise and complex system design
Progressive difficulty allows for comprehensive AI capability assessment
